name: Peko Peko Dragons
description:
(A work in progress, project on hold)

A wizard has severed and scattered your dragon powers across the world. Take control and help the dragons regain their former powers. Bite, eat, and spit your way through enemies to regain what is rightfully yours.

Gamepad recommended.

Learn more about this and other games I made on my website: https://davidkzhu.com
